name: 埃万杰利斯塔·托里拆利
bio_short: 意大利物理学家和数学家，伽利略的学生。他因发明水银气压计、首次制造出持续的真空，并证明大气压强的存在而闻名于世。
bio_short_en: An Italian physicist and mathematician and a student of Galileo. He is famous for inventing the mercury barometer, creating the first sustained vacuum, and proving the existence of atmospheric pressure.
